name: Slider
description: A component used to set a value in a range

maximumValue.label: Maximum value
maximumValue.description: The maximum value of the slider

minimumValue.label: Minimum value
minimumValue.description: The minimum value of the slider

step.label: Step
step.description: The amount the value should change per step

fieldName.label: Field name
fieldName.description: The name of the field within the screen that will store this component's value

maximumTrackTintColor.label: Maximum Color
maximumTrackTintColor.description: Color of the track from the right of the thumb

minimumTrackTintColor.label: Minimum Color
minimumTrackTintColor.description: Color of the track from the left of the thumb

disabledThumbTintColor.label: Disabled Thumb Tint Color
disabledThumbTintColor.description: Color of the thumb when the slider is disabled

thumbTouchSize.label: Hit Slop
thumbTouchSize.description: The size of the hit slop

trackBorderRadius.label: Track Border Radius
trackBorderRadius.description: The border radius for the track

thumbBorderRadius.label: Thumb Border Radius
thumbBorderRadius.description: The border radius for the thumb
